website_summaries.verdict: Decent price for a universal gazebo fit and weather-resistant net. Attractive soft brown color lends a sophisticated air.
pros: Easy to open and close with shower curtain-style track for grommet and rings
Tiebacks are thick and weather resistant
Panels go to the ground to deter bugs from flying in at the bottom
cons: Inconsistent panel length, and some gaps may let bugs in
Some consumers say it is not truly universal

customer_reviews.title: So simple to install
customer_reviews.text: It was as expected two thumbs up and Sunjoy told me a universal netting wouldn't work. Shame on them. Thanks APEX
customer_reviews.author: Zeona

customer_reviews.title: Used to enclose our patio awning.
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! We used it to enclose our patio awning. The awning company gave us an estimate of $2800. to custom fit screen curtains. We simply couldn't afford that price. We found on Amazon search this Gazebo replacement netting. We couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and a nice feature the originals didn't have
customer_reviews.text: These fit the Allen + Roth gazebo we bought from Lowe's perfectly! In fact, they're better than the originals in at least one sense...there's a tie down at the bottom of each corner which saved me from having to make the same modification that I made to the originals in order to keep them from blowing up in the wind. The color is a bit darker than the originals but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sutter

customer_reviews.title: Strong material.
customer_reviews.text: This netting was nicer than the original that came with the gazebo. it's a little larger than the original (wider and longer. It came with the rings to hang it with and its about 1/2 inch longer so it touches the floor of my deck. It will flow all over the place when it's windy so I just tacked it onto the floor so it doesn't. This works for me.) but works just as well. I like the sheerness yet softness of the material. It has withstood some strong winds and has held up. It looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Works, but fit could be better
customer_reviews.text: Very similar to the original allen+roth screen from Lowe's, both in look and quality. It is slightly smaller than the original, however, which is disappointing considering it is specifically designed to fit that gazebo. While it does close completely, it is tight and pulls inward so you lose a few inches of usable space inside. Overall I'm glad to have it, but to get five stars it would need to be a few inches wider on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: by far the best one we've purchased so far
customer_reviews.text: by far the best one we've purchased so far. This was even better than the one that originally came with screen house . Ours was a steel roofed one so were hoping to get many years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: A little large but good value.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a tad bit larger than our original otherwise; I'd give it 5 stars. It has some slack in it. It comes with plastic rings which we did not need because we have slider hooks. The panels do have grommets in them to hang them just like our original but there's more grommets than we have hooks so there's some slack letting the curtain sag. We remedy this temporarily by tacking the sagging material. We are happy to have mosquito protection & this was a good deal overall.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Went on box store gazebo easy as pie.
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a charm! Easy to install. Just wish I can find replacement side curtains sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: After market
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, right size, basically it works and works well. But it is after market so there are little things that don't fit perfect like the original did. The install was a little tough because the grommets are smaller than the original and I had to work around that to get it hung. I don't have hooks I have buttons that snap through the grommets, that took some time manipulate the grommets. Some of the buttons broke trying to get them to fit but what ever. I am happy to sit out at night with no bugs. I would recommend to a friend like I said it works
customer_reviews.author: R. Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than the original screens. The black color is easier on the eyes and in fact is almost invisible as far as seeing through it! They went on to the original hooks fine. Another thing is that they have ties at the middle and bottom of each corner which keeps them from being so loose. They only complaint I have is that with time, they seem to grow a bit longer, but so did the originals I guess something to do with the weave of the mesh. I certainly will order again if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for the 10 x 12 Berkley Jensen hardtopGazebo gazebo. It fits perfectly I
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the 10 x 12 Berkley Jensen hardtop gazebo. It fits perfectly I just love it it was easy to install and the clips came with it I bought the curtains and the screening
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: saved me from buying a new gazebo!
customer_reviews.text: Last year a bear decided to leave it's mark on our screens on the gazebo. We have had this thing for about 4 years, so it was starting to show it's age, and didn't really want to go buy another one. Luckily, we were able to order the replacement screens, and at a great price! Instead of spending $400+ on a new gazebo, we only spent $70 apprx and now it's practically new and usable. Great quality, fast service, affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: grammy lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great fix for bug protection!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 10x12 pergola, and we decided to modify this by cutting the four corner lines so we could staple the screen edges to the wood and make it more permanent. Also, to better seal the corners. Although it says 10x12 it’s very large so we still had some slack, we decided to keep the slack so our dog won’t break the screen trying to go to the bathroom. The screen material is very soft like netting.
customer_reviews.author: amazing123

customer_reviews.title: The perfect replacement screen!
customer_reviews.text: My gazebo originally came with a screen which is especially important as I live in Florida, aka mosquito-land. Sad to say, one of the neighborhood felines shredded the screen and I had to throw it out. That was a couple of years ago. I suffered through several mosquito seasons and decided to take a chance as my yard is mostly cat-free at this point. I ordered the Apex Garden replacement screen and it is absolutely perfect. It was easy to install, and is a stronger netting than the original one. Now I'm able to sit outside and enjoy my patio and gazebo without being bugged!
customer_reviews.author: judith mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement since the people we bought the house from only left us the pergola frame (cheapskates)! But this worked out perfectly! The directions were a little confusing with how they’re numbered (1, 2, 3, 4), but with a little common sense you can easily figure it out. As long as you match the 2 long pieces and 2 short pieces with the 2 long and 2 short sides of the pergola frame, you’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Medical Professional

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the bug out.
customer_reviews.text: Netting seems a bit lightweight but it keeps the bugs at bay. Easy to install. Because we get a lot of wind we will buy velcro straps or or bungie cords to add extra ties to keep the netting secure to the 4 corner posts when not in use. Also noticed the netting does help to reduce some of the sun but also prevents some of the breeze from passing through. Time will tell how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great replacement for original, except now it leaks on seams
customer_reviews.text: this is probably the 3rd set of mosquito screens I have ordered over the last 4 years. sometimes I leave them up over the winter sometimes not, usually will last thru 2 seasons if you take them down and store them, by the end of second year start to get brittle from sun, but for the price I don't expect them to last forever. Good product UPDATE !! So after installing the new top, it rained and it leaks at the seam lines, so I guess I get to apply some type of seam sealer, hum,
customer_reviews.author: PaPa G

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Average Quality
customer_reviews.text: Two big plusses for this particular set are they use grommets rather than sewn on loops for attaching the hooks/loops, and they label each zipper end making it super easy to get the screens matched! We had to replace our original screens because of the sewn on loops tore out from the screens so we expect these with grommets to be a lot stronger. With the zippers labeled next year we won't have to play guesswork getting the length of the zippers to match!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Scharf

customer_reviews.title: Just take care of it
customer_reviews.text: Takes two to install. Took about 2 hours. Lots of sweat and hard work up on a ladder. Be careful not to pull too hard when putting it on the corners as it could tear easily at the seams. But once upon, absolutely wonderful. This is our third one. Do not leave it up in the fall or winter. Heavy winds, snow, rain, all year it up.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Oh My Goodness! Cannot tell you how pleased we are with this product! It arrived quickly, all parts intact, and directions were included. It was so easy to install and fits perfectly with dimensions measured to fit. The zippers, were easy to operate for access and closure. A sufficient amount of hooks were also included. So pleased with our purchase and only wish it would have been ordered years ago. Thank you for such a quality product at such an affordable price. Know we will enjoy it for many summers to come. Only wish I would have ordered the brown instead of the tan. Pat
customer_reviews.author: Trish D.

customer_reviews.title: qualtity netting.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy that this item could be adapted to fit my gazebo. I had to struggle a bit with attaching the screens brass hole fittings to my gazebo's hangers, but that is not reflection on the product. I was happy to get a replacement netting that I could make work.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S

customer_reviews.title: NOT STURDY
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install. I just put this up 1 wk ago and the screening is ripped already. I have bought/replaced this product several times already. I would love to see the screening made out of something more durable like maybe a heavier nylon maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi T.

customer_reviews.title: great replacement screen for my 10x12 gazebo
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these so far for our aluminum all year round gazebo. The fit is almost perfect! This one has more eyelets than my gazebo has hooks, but it works well! First one lasted 2 1/2 years, which I think is great for the outdoor elements!
customer_reviews.author: jaols

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product fit my needs perfectly. After having ordered and received an insect screen from Lowe's Hardware that was not as advertised, I was very happy to find this Apex Garden item on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Judy N. Piephoff

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for net on gazebo bought at Lowe’s . Has more grommets than original. Apex also has the plastic hooks. Couldn’t be more pleased
customer_reviews.author: earl

customer_reviews.title: NICE REPLACMENT
customer_reviews.text: Really nice replacement netting two years ago I bought a netting from another maker it was small and tight the wind ripped it because it was to tight this has some play much better thank you. Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: N.Y.BOB

customer_reviews.title: Product feels solid. Gave it a 4 star review ...
customer_reviews.text: Product feels solid. Gave it a 4 star review for quality and shipping speed. Once everything is setup, will post pictures and update review.
customer_reviews.author: D_S

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace our screen portion of our screen house and even though it was bought from the same manufacturer the quality is very poor. The screen is much weaker and pulls away from the zipper portion of the unit. I've had to stitch so much of it back up as it just pulls away from zipper. It's better than nothing but not by much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S. Madore

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are easy to follow and can be done by one person, though two make it go faster.
customer_reviews.text: We live in Texas where mosquitos, wasps and flies are a big nuisance. Since installing our replacement mosquito netting, sitting on our patio is once again a joy morning to evening. The birds visit our fountain to play and bathe taking no mind to the netting so it is not uncommon to see 5 or 6 varieties having a 'swim party' unaware that we are near.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Hadley

customer_reviews.title: This replacement mosquito netting fit the bill perfectly. It ...
customer_reviews.text: This replacement mosquito netting fit the bill perfectly. It came with new hooks for hanging and seemed to be sturdier than the original netting.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Practical and efficient mosquito Net!
customer_reviews.text: I like this brown color very much. The previous one we had was beige and it got dirty much easier. It’s also easy to put up! The length is perfect because it goes all the way down to the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This product was the exact one I needed for my 10 *12 Gazebo. It fit like a glove. I was so pleased with the fit and quality of the netting that I returned a canopy i purchased from another manufacturer that didn't fit that I bought the Apex Garden version. I was pleased to find the Apex version of the canopy fit perfectly as well! As far as I am concerned Apex Garden IS the Replacement Brand for your Lowes 10 *12 Gazebo!
customer_reviews.author: McRamon

customer_reviews.title: Privacy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for privacy on our back porch. Only two sides of the porch is open so we crunched it up and hung as curtains. It will be a plus if it keeps out mosquitos and bees but for me it was just some privacy we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Martha J. Harden

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly as a replacement for the original screen. Only thing to note is that this replacement screen has 5 more grommet holes per panel than the original. So you will need to also purchase 20 additional hangers which the company sells in packs of 36.
customer_reviews.author: DanB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Durable product....
customer_reviews.text: We used this product to enclose our deck with an awning; it gave us privacy and a nice ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I like this item - it’s a bit darker than the original, but looks nice and is holding up so far. I can’t speak to durability as it’s only been in use a few weeks, but we’ll see
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: I just received the netting two days ago so I cannot speak for the durability yet but it seems to be very well made. It has more grommets than my other one so I will have to add some j hooks, but that is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Mosquito netting fit perfectly. Well made product. What I like about this netting is it comes with ties at the bottom which tie around each post which my original netting did not have. Great feature!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great universal net.
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the OEM from Sun shades has been back ordered for over a year. So this is the next best thing Had to enlarge the grommet holes, easily done with a grommet setting tool.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you tie them to get more life out of them!
customer_reviews.text: Fit our Lowe’s 2015 year model perfectly! These usually don’t last as long where we live because it gets super windy here. We usually buy from Lowe’s but we thought to try amazon and it’s exactly the same! I love that we can replace it whenever we need!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Narvaez

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: The netting was just as advertised. Easy to install, strong zippered panels on each of the four sides in the middle. Only issue I have is the zipper being at the very top and I am a little short. Hubby has no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sndyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement netting!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my hardtop gazebo perfectly so I bought a second one. Being outside in the weather 24/7 means that the netting will tear and get damaged over time so I felt it prudent to go ahead and get a spare while they were available.
customer_reviews.author: JWINK

customer_reviews.title: Good product out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my netting and this seemed to be the right size. Fits well on my oval 12x10 gazebo and the chocolate brown looks great. There are also ties to attach the middle of each panel to the gazebo middle and bottom and extra ties to gather the curtains when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Finkelstein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the construction and netting material is stronger and better than the original.
customer_reviews.author: XLNC

customer_reviews.title: Fit my berkley jensen 10' x 12' hardtop gazebo
customer_reviews.text: Order the black one for a Berkley Jensen 10' x 12' hardtop gazebo that I purchased from BJ's. This fit it nicely. Not sure about durability as I just installed it.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and great color
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves the Gazebo. It is a nice cover for the seating area. It wasn't too difficult to put together and it fit perfectly. It's important to know the size of the area. So measure before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn of Philly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fit our Sunjoy gazebo. Although it was a little short lengthwise we were able to pull it and make it work. So much cheaper than Sunjoy replacement and looks the same.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: good item for gazebo
customer_reviews.text: i have the allen roth gazebo from lowe's and these mosquito netting curtains fit perfectly and allow me to keep my gazebo in top condition.
customer_reviews.author: J. N. Seamon

customer_reviews.title: Gazebo canopy
customer_reviews.text: Very very thin. Will not last. If you have a gazebo that needs ask an awning company to make you one from Sunbrella fabric. Pay more but will last 10-15 years vs 1-2 yrs
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito netting.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it gives you a since of security from larger bugs and bees, by smaller bugs seem to find their way into the netting area.
customer_reviews.author: M Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Replacement screen and curtains
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old curtains after7 years and I love the new one's they have straps on them top and bottom witch my old's ones didn't I also replace the screen witch has straps on the bottom that I like also hope that this is helpful for you very good material I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: netting is thin and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Within the first week we first received this I noticed there were a few snags. This material is very thin and flimsy. We now have multiple small holes. We keep the furniture covered when not in use. I am disappointed that it is not as durable as the original netting. Totally bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love it fits perfect and zipper on every side. Now it will keep bugs and Bird dropping out of the kids pool.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I needed to keep out those aggravating bugs. Even though a small amount make it inside, it's nothing like it was before I made this purchase. If I had to, I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PMC

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Good length. Standard 10x10 didn't fit my gazebo, this 10x12 was perfect. A bit pricey but keeps bugs out!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Loved the screen for our 10x10 gazebo. It seems pretty durable and the zippers seem like they will hold up well. The bottom is longer than the screen room I have and that’s pretty nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best
customer_reviews.text: We used the screens for one summer season and already have it coming apart at one of the seams. Disappointed in the quality. Prior screens have lasted 2-3 years (different brand).
customer_reviews.author: A huge ataris fan

customer_reviews.title: returned it
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. The material seems flimsy and the threading was hanging out all over
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected a better quality net. It was easy to install but a day after installing the tie straps ripped off in the light wind experienced in my back yard. Would not recommend this product I should have spent the money to get the original that was designed for my Gazebo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value & quality net
customer_reviews.text: Replacement netting for my Allen Roth 10 x 12 gazebo. Fits perfect and is as good of quality if not better than what came with the gazebo.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 10’ x 12’ gazebo
customer_reviews.text: We installed these replacement nettings in our Allen and Roth 10’ x 12’ gazebo. Fit perfectly. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: High quality material, super easy to install and the best part is no more bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Dickey

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: Used them for a pergola we built. Bought an extra set because it was larger than the screens. Working out great.
customer_reviews.author: doesn't shop alot

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: We are please with the screen. It fits our 10x12 gazebo perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: skiwoods

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty quality gazeebo curtains.
customer_reviews.text: Great gazeebo curtsins. Heavy fabric, not see through. Blocks sun, wind, rain fabulously.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: buy it you'll love it
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough how much I love these, looks so much better, just zip when needed.
customer_reviews.author: mpkrist

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Great material. Easy to setup. Now my parents can enjoy their backyard w/o mosquitos bothering them.
customer_reviews.author: Geremy Yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement bug nets.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Match the top. I’m happy with the screens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: Only had this installed a month and the entire bottom came off one panel. Never even zipped the netting closed to use as mosquito netting.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: So grateful for Apex Gardens! I was so excited to get my replacement mosquito net from them. They had very easy to follow instructions for the replacement. I love the quality and durability of my product. Thank you Apex Gardens for your excellent customer service, too.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us
customer_reviews.text: It did not work with our wooden gazebo. We thought we could make rods and use it but it would have looked bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie

customer_reviews.title: No bugs
customer_reviews.text: great way to keep the mosquito out. Very easy to put up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and a hundred dollars cheaper than the manufacturer... Got it while I was able to get this eventually much needed item later...
customer_reviews.author: D. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased there for our new gazebo. They seem well made. I will need to add weights to the bottom as it’s quite windy here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love the replacement—better match than the original. Seems like it may hold up better too.
customer_reviews.author: V. Marney

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right size
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly as it should, our gazebo is 5 years old. This site told us that there are 2 different sizes. Maybe that's why the last one from elsewhere ripped so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Drace

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger then the original one, still fits my 10 x 12 gazebo good.
customer_reviews.author: 🌞Nana🌞

customer_reviews.title: Color not tan
customer_reviews.text: Net did not fit Color is NOT Tan but gold Don’t like the Color but it’s up and guess I’ll have to Live with it Curtains were all labeled different sizes and about 6 inches shy to close all the way around Left the side which is next to house opened to make it work Good quality But wish it closed all the way around
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Allensworth

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: You cannot find this at Lowe's, I don't know how you can get them and Lowe's can't, THANKS APEX GARDEN.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Topa

customer_reviews.title: Apex Mosquito Netting
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance and ordered this product. Recently bought a house that had a Canopy Type Gazebo on the deck. I had no idea who manufactured of the gazebo, but it looked like one from Lowes. I installed the netting, it was a perfect fit and identical to the one I replaced. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: James Sabo

customer_reviews.title: I am 74 and I put
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect arrived when promised,easy to install loved the color will certainly purchase one again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes T. Arbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Great Netting for Our Bug Free Zone!
customer_reviews.text: This mosquito netting is of better quality than the Original and that lasted us 4 years until our new puppy chewed giant holes in it. It has ties in the middle and at the bottom for the ground level unlike the original. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kerryleigh

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced old netting.Good quality. They were short on some hook up rings , called them and received them a few days later.
customer_reviews.author: paul berube

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily.
customer_reviews.text: The mosquito netting is fragile and tears easily. Form, fit and function otherwise is great.
customer_reviews.author: George K.

customer_reviews.title: Tie-offs coming unthreaded one one day.  So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I put this up yesterday. In one windy day one of the bottom tie offs came unthreaded. It fits perfectly, but I am disappointed that after one day it is coming apart. I would expect it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Little large but works.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't quite fit, little large but we doubled up the hook in spots and it still looks good and works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than original
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and nicer than original netting that came with gazebo. Update: after only using for one season it's falling apart at the seams, totally worthless now.
customer_reviews.author: Shp4Kds

customer_reviews.title: Thanks I cannot think of anything to state at this time!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks we are very pleased with our neeting we think its great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mosquito netting is a better quality then the original one and a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Duplicate panels sent therefore directions couldn’t be followed. Also panels much too long. My hard top gazebo is a 10x 12 and netting is at least 12 inches to long. I want to exchange for 10x10 but no return or exchange paper work in box. What do I do?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I received this screen supposedly a 12x10...instead what I received was 4 shredded partitions that actually appeared to have been cut to pieces..I'm thoroughly disappointed and upset because we planned on using this screen for this weekend while camping by the lake
customer_reviews.author: Bear Nation

customer_reviews.title: Fits Allen and Roth gazebo well
customer_reviews.text: This item was as described and seems to be of decent quality. The fit was very good for my Allen and Roth 10'x12' gazebo tent. The color was a little darker than the original, but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, look nice. Had one heavy rain and wind storm and it tore.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Torn along the seam
customer_reviews.text: Looks like this particular one slipped through “quality control”. One of the panels has little holes in the netting all the way along the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect. It fit perfectly. It's better than the original netting.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Wong

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my staycation gazebo this summer. It fit my 12 X 10 gazebo well, came with hooks to hang onto the gazebo frame. The zippers work well and the ties for the frame are long enough so the netting doesn't stretch. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Buckley

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: ordered this the same time as the canopy top, came right after we received the top. perfect fit..no problems, now just waiting for the summer!!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Gazebo Screen Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Our gazebo is now 3 years old, and we had a few good size holes in the screen so we decided it was time to replace it. Very happy with the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Deb in Saginaw

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with netting
customer_reviews.text: Squirrels had scratched and eaten through our previous netting. So replaced it with the APEX Garden one. Very pleased. It appears to be durable and was very easy to install. The dimensions were as stated and worked great on my 10X12 gazebo.
customer_reviews.author: EFJ

customer_reviews.title: good zippers good exact dimensions and netting is tough
customer_reviews.text: Solid well made product. good zippers good exact dimensions and netting is tough.
customer_reviews.author: realjb

product_meta.title: APEX GARDEN Universal 10' x 12' Gazebo Replacement Mosquito Netting (Mosquito Net Only)
feature_bullets: The Mosquito Bug Net can fit most 10' x 12' gazebos. It is also designed to use with Lowe's allen roth 12-ft L x 10-ft W gazebo #355094 & 510327.
Replacement Insect Netting ONLY. Not including canopy and metal models. 100% polyester, Weather-resistant, CPAI-84 US Standard fire-retardant fabric.
Four(4) wall enclosures. Zippers in center of each side allows for easy entry and exit.
Dimensions: 144" (L) x 120" (W) x 86" (H). Please do the measurements of your gazebo and make sure that our product will fit it.

Worry-free, produced by original factory. Grommet top. Clip Rings included. Replacement "J" Hooks sold separately. Note: Not all gazebos and sunshades are designed with netting or curtains. Before placing your order, please check the structure of your gazebo or sunshade for a track in which netting or curtains can be used. The product will include rings to hang netting or curtains.
